docs.title: SYNOPSIS
docs.text: Builds a properly formatted ntfy action header string for use with ntfy message actions.

docs.title: View (Default)
docs.text: Build-NtfyAction -ActionView -Label <string> -URL <string> [-Clear] [<CommonParameters>]

docs.title: Http
docs.text:
Build-NtfyAction -ActionHttp -Label <string> -URL <string> [-Method <string>] [-Headers <hashtable>]
 [-Body <string>] [-ClearHttp] [<CommonParameters>]

docs.title: Broadcast
docs.text:
Build-NtfyAction -ActionBroadcast -Label <string> [-Intent <string>] [-Extras <hashtable>]
 [-ClearBroadcast] [<CommonParameters>]

docs.title: ALIASES
docs.text: This cmdlet has the following aliases, {{Insert list of aliases}}

docs.title: DESCRIPTION
docs.text: Constructs an ntfy action header string based on the provided parameters. Supports 'view', 'http', and 'broadcast' actions, and allows for optional HTTP methods, headers, body, intent, extras, and clear options. This function is useful for building the Actions header for ntfy messages that require user interaction or automation. Supports up to 3 actions per notification.

docs.title: EXAMPLE 1
docs.text: Build-NtfyAction -ActionView -Label 'Open Website' -URL 'https://example.com'

docs.title: EXAMPLE 2
docs.text: Build-NtfyAction -ActionHttp -Label 'Trigger API' -URL 'https://api.example.com/trigger' -Method 'POST' -Body '{"foo":"bar"}' -Headers @{ Authorization = 'Bearer token' }

docs.title: EXAMPLE 3
docs.text: Build-NtfyAction -ActionBroadcast -Label 'Custom Intent' -Intent 'io.heckel.ntfy.USER_ACTION' -Extras @{ key1 = 'value1' }

docs.title: Example: Send broadcast action to take a screenshot
docs.text: $action = Build-NtfyAction -ActionBroadcast -Label 'Take Screenshot' -Extras @{ cmd = 'screenshot' } Send-NtfyMessage -Topic 'ntfypwsh' -Body 'Please take a screenshot.' -Action $action

docs.title: System.String. Returns a formatted ntfy action header string.
docs.text: {{ Fill in the Description }}

docs.title: NOTES
docs.text: See https://docs.ntfy.sh/publish/#actions for more details on ntfy actions. Project: https://github.com/ptmorris1/NtfyPwsh

docs.title: SYNOPSIS
docs.text: Sends a message to an ntfy topic with optional customization and authentication.

docs.title: Anonymous (Default)
docs.text:
Send-NtfyMessage -Topic <string> [-Title <string>] [-Body <string>] [-URI <string>]
 [-Phone <string>] [-Priority <string>] [-Tags <string[]>] [-SkipCertCheck] [-Delay <string>]
 [-OnClick <string>] [-Action <array>] [-AttachmentPath <string>] [-AttachmentName <string>]
 [-AttachmentURL <string>] [-Icon <string>] [-Email <string>] [-Credential <pscredential>]
 [-TokenCreds <pscredential>] [-NoCache] [-Markdown] [-FirebaseNo] [<CommonParameters>]

docs.title: TokenCreds
docs.text:
Send-NtfyMessage -Topic <string> [-Title <string>] [-Body <string>] [-URI <string>]
 [-Phone <string>] [-Priority <string>] [-Tags <string[]>] [-SkipCertCheck] [-Delay <string>]
 [-OnClick <string>] [-Action <array>] [-AttachmentPath <string>] [-AttachmentName <string>]
 [-AttachmentURL <string>] [-Icon <string>] [-Email <string>] [-TokenCreds <pscredential>]
 [-NoCache] [-Markdown] [-FirebaseNo] [<CommonParameters>]

docs.title: Credential
docs.text:
Send-NtfyMessage -Topic <string> [-Title <string>] [-Body <string>] [-URI <string>]
 [-Phone <string>] [-Priority <string>] [-Tags <string[]>] [-SkipCertCheck] [-Delay <string>]
 [-OnClick <string>] [-Action <array>] [-AttachmentPath <string>] [-AttachmentName <string>]
 [-AttachmentURL <string>] [-Icon <string>] [-Email <string>] [-Credential <pscredential>]
 [-NoCache] [-Markdown] [-FirebaseNo] [<CommonParameters>]

docs.title: ALIASES
docs.text: This cmdlet has the following aliases, {{Insert list of aliases}}

docs.title: DESCRIPTION
docs.text: Sends a message to an ntfy topic using the ntfy REST API. Supports custom title, body, priority, tags, actions, attachments (local file or URL), icons, email, phone, delayed/scheduled delivery, click actions, markdown formatting, no-cache, disable Firebase forwarding, and more. Allows for authentication using either Basic (username/password) or Bearer (API token) methods. Can be used with public ntfy.sh or self-hosted ntfy instances. Supports PowerShell credential objects for authentication. Compatible with all ntfy features as of module version.

docs.title: EXAMPLE 1
docs.text: Send-NtfyMessage -Topic 'ntfypwsh' -Title 'Hello' -Body 'This is a test message'

docs.title: EXAMPLE 2
docs.text: $creds = Get-Credential -UserName api Send-NtfyMessage -Topic 'ntfypwsh' -Body 'With Bearer token' -TokenCreds $creds

docs.title: EXAMPLE 3
docs.text: $creds = Get-Credential -UserName user Send-NtfyMessage -Topic 'ntfypwsh' -Body 'With Basic Auth' -Credential $creds

docs.title: EXAMPLE 4
docs.text: Send-NtfyMessage -Topic 'ntfypwsh' -Body 'With attachment' -AttachmentPath 'C:\temp\file.txt'

docs.title: EXAMPLE 5
docs.text: Send-NtfyMessage -Topic 'ntfypwsh' -Body 'With attachment from URL' -AttachmentURL 'https://example.com/file.txt'

docs.title: EXAMPLE 6
docs.text: Send-NtfyMessage -Topic 'ntfypwsh' -Body 'With icon' -Icon 'https://example.com/icon.png'

docs.title: EXAMPLE 7
docs.text: Send-NtfyMessage -Topic 'ntfypwsh' -Body 'With click action' -OnClick 'https://example.com'

docs.title: EXAMPLE 8
docs.text: Send-NtfyMessage -Topic 'ntfypwsh' -Body 'With scheduled delivery' -Delay '10m'

docs.title: EXAMPLE 9
docs.text: Send-NtfyMessage -Topic 'ntfypwsh' -Body 'With markdown' -Markdown

docs.title: EXAMPLE 10
docs.text: Send-NtfyMessage -Topic 'ntfypwsh' -Body "This message won't be stored server-side" -NoCache

docs.title: EXAMPLE 11
docs.text: Send-NtfyMessage -Topic 'ntfypwsh' -Body "This message won't be forwarded to FCM" -FirebaseNo

docs.title: CommonParameters
docs.text: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutBuffer, -OutVariable, -PipelineVariable, -ProgressAction, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable. For more information, see about_CommonParameters.

docs.title: NOTES
docs.text: See https://docs.ntfy.sh/publish/ for more details on ntfy message options. Project: https://github.com/ptmorris1/NtfyPwsh

docs.title: 📅 Changelog
docs.text: All notable changes to the NtfyPwsh module will be documented in this file.

docs.title: Changed
docs.text:
• Moved functions to their own .ps1 files for better modularity and maintainability.
  • Removed examples.md and now use the blog post as the primary location for all examples.

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Added mkdocs documentation support for the project.

docs.title: Updated
docs.text:
• Updated comment-based help in the module.
  • Tested on Linux.

docs.title: Linux Known Issues
docs.text:
• -Delay parameter does not work.
  • -Email sends message to ntfy but does not send email.

docs.title: Release
docs.text: • First official release of NtfyPwsh.

docs.title: Added
docs.text:
• Added -Markdown parameter to Send-NtfyMessage to enable Markdown formatting in notifications.
  • Added Write-Verbose statements for debugging headers and payloads sent to the server.
  • Added -FirebaseNo parameter to Send-NtfyMessage to avoid forwarding messages to FirebaseCloudMessaging (if configured)

docs.title: Changed
docs.text:
• The -Action parameter in Send-NtfyMessage was removed and replaced with the parameters -ActionView, -ActionHttp, and -ActionBroadcast for building actions using Build-NtfyAction.
  • ⚠️ Breaking: You must now use Build-NtfyAction with the new action type parameters to construct actions for Send-NtfyMessage.

docs.title: Removed
docs.text: • The -Action parameter from Send-NtfyMessage has been removed. Use Build-NtfyAction with the new action type parameters instead.

docs.title: Fixed
docs.text: • Parameter sets now more strictly enforce Ntfy requirements for each action.

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Added -NoCache Parameter to Send-NtfyMessage to prevent the message from being cached server-side

docs.title: Fixed
docs.text: • Fixed and updated parameter sets.

docs.title: Updated
docs.text:
• Updated docs with examples and more detail.
  • Updated comment-based help in module.

docs.title: Breaking
docs.text:
• Authentication method changed:
  • Now uses -TokenCreds for API using Get-Credential.
  • Now uses -Credential for username and password using Get-Credential.
  • Removed -PlainTextToken.

docs.title: Fixed
docs.text:
• Fixed tags parameter.
  • Updated tag value to 'partying_face'.

docs.title: Added
docs.text: • Default parameter set.

docs.title: Fixed
docs.text: • Parameter set issues.

docs.title: Initial Release
docs.text:
• Initial release of NtfyPwsh.
  • Used to send notifications to ntfy from PowerShell in a module.

📌 This changelog follows Keep a Changelog principles.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: Powershell module to send ntfy notifications.

docs.title: Build-NtfyAction
docs.text: Builds a properly formatted ntfy action header string for use with ntfy message actions.

docs.title: Send-NtfyMessage
docs.text: Sends a message to an ntfy topic with optional customization and authentication.

docs.title: Build-NtfyAction
docs.text: Builds a properly formatted ntfy action header string for use with ntfy message actions.

docs.title: Send-NtfyMessage
docs.text: Sends a message to an ntfy topic with optional customization and authentication.
